original_text: David spoke with the officers of his army. Some of them were the leaders of 1,000 men. Other officers were the leaders of 100 men. Chronicles 12 Chronicles 14
korean_text: 다윗이 천부장과 백부장 곧 모든 지휘관과 더불어 의논하고

sentences.original_text: David spoke with the officers of his army
Some of them were the leaders of 1,000 men
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 일부는 천 명의 지도자였다

sentences.original_text: Other officers were the leaders of 100 men
